page.title: 04Education in Eglwysbach
page.content: In our village there is a Nursery Group for little children, aged 2-3\. The Nursery is in the village hall, called Aberconwy Hall. When they come to the Primary School they start in the afternoon. They then come all day when they are four years old and stay until eleven years old. School starts at 9 o'clock. We have dinner at 12 o'clock and go home at about 3.30pm. The school was 150 years old this year. After the Primary School you go to Llanrwst School or Creuddyn School. The school bus comes at 8.15am and returns at about 4.15pm. The distance from Eglwysbach to Llanrwst or Creuddyn is about 9 miles and you stay in that school until you are 16, or 18 if you are really good. Then you go to Llandrillo Technical College or Bangor Technical College and there is a bus service to each college.
